amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds for the Missouri River Ecosystem Restoration Program (MRERP).
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 16 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds for the Missouri River Ecosystem Restoration Program (MRERP).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luetkemeyer amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A057) offered by Mr. Luetkemeyer.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luetkemeyer amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.
